1: I trust in my connection with the divine for support.
2: I seek you day and night, and you hear me.
3: I experience joy in praising the divine presence.
4: Trust brings deliverance and support in every challenge.
5: I trust and find deliverance in seeking help.
6: I rise above negativity and embrace my true worth.
7: I rise above mockery and embrace my strength.
8: Trusting in the divine brings joyful deliverance and support.
9: I have hope and support from my beginnings.
10: I trust in the divine presence that supports me always.
11: I seek support in times of trouble and find strength.
12: I stand strong and confident against powerful challenges.
13: I stand strong and confident in the face of challenges.
14: I stay resilient and strong despite life's challenges.
15: I find renewal and strength in challenging moments.
16: I rise strong despite challenges surrounding me.
17: I embrace my strength and confidence in every situation.
18: Generosity brings people together in shared experiences.
19: I feel your strength and seek your help.
20: I find strength and protection in challenging times.
21: I trust in strength and find support in challenging times.
22: I praise you joyfully in the company of others.
23: I praise and glorify the divine with all my being.
24: I trust that when I call, I am heard and supported.
25: I joyfully share my gratitude with everyone who cares.
26: I find satisfaction and joy in seeking greatness.
27: All people will unite in worship and remembrance.
28: The universe thrives under a wise and guiding authority.
29: I celebrate and worship abundantly with gratitude for life.
30: A seed thrives and brings lasting blessings.
31: I share righteousness with future generations.
